Privacy Policy

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal information we receive from users of our app (ArqmaDroid).

By using the app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

Data Collected

Personal data is any kind of data that could identify an individual.

Arqma keys and public addresses are collected and processed by the app locally for the purpose of processing transactions and transmitted into the Arq-Net in encrypted form.

Other personal data is not collected by the app.

If you use the exchange (optional) functionality, ArqmaDroid fetches the exchange rate through the public API of coinmarketcap.com. See their privacy policy at https://coinmarketcap.com/privacy for details on how data in your requests is collected.

App Permissions

  • INTERNET : Connect to the Arq-Net via a Arqma Daemon Node
  • READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Read wallet files stored on the device
  • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Write wallet files stored on the device
  • WAKE_LOCK : Keep device awake while syncing
  • CAMERA : Scan QR Codes for receiving Arqma

Contact Us

If you have any questions about our privacy policy, or how your data is being collected and processed, please e-mail support@arqma.com.
